summary: Use this API to check order refundable amounts
description:
Use this API to check order refundable amounts.​ Version
202309
  
API Testing Tool
​

query.description: Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. ​ Get by API Get Authorization Shop​
Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.​
Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders. ​
Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.​

header.description: The seller access_token value from Get Access Token, when user_type = 0. Follow this guide to get seller access_token.​

body.description: Request type​ - CANCEL​ - REFUND​ - RETURN_AND_REFUND​ Note: different request types are used for different aftersales scenarios. Also, different request types might have different refund amounts, because the refund amount calculation policy is different.​
How buyer ships items to seller when in a return request, could be:​ - PLATFORM​ - BUYER_ARRANGE​

Which handover method buyer chooses to use when returning goods to seller by platform​ - DROP_OFF: buyer drops off the parcel in logistics service collect point.​ - PICKUP: logistics service picks up the buyer package.​
Seller's reason to create a return，all available reasons, please reference to API overview.​
TikTok Shop order line item ids.​

children.description: Quantity seller wants to create a return request.​
Sku id seller wants to create a return request.​

schema.description: The success or failure status code returned in API response.​
The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.​

children.description: Total price of item be returned.​
Retail delivery fee takes effect once platform GMV exceeds 500,000 USD, according to US Colorado states' compliance rules.​
